sentence: Haha, yeah, I totally get what you mean! Formal language can feel pretty outdated in most casual settings. It's like speaking a whole different dialect sometimes. But I guess it still has its place, especially when you're dealing with professional emails or trying to make a good impression in certain situations. It's all about reading the room, right? Have you ever been caught off guard by someone using really formal language out of nowhere?

OMG, yes! üòÇ One time my friend sent me a text starting with "To whom it may concern," and I was like... bro, are you filing a complaint or texting me? üíÄ It's all about vibes for real. Like, if you're applying for jobs or chatting up your boss, maybe bust out the fancy words. But in normal convos? Nah fam, keep it chill. What's the most formal thing you've said to someone by accident and cringed later? üôà Spill the tea! ‚òïÔ∏è

LOL, okay so I was talking to my friend's mom once, and instead of just saying "hey," I accidentally dropped a whole "I hope this message finds you well." üò≠ Felt like I was emailing the queen or smth. She just gave me this look like, u good? üòÇ Can't even with myself sometimes. What's your go-to word or phrase that lowkey makes you cringe when it slips out? üëÄ Let's hear it!

OMG, same energy üòÇ I once said "With all due respect" during a casual argument with my friend and it was so awk. Felt like I was in some courtroom drama, no cap. Now they tease me about it all the time üôÑ What's your most random, cringe phrase that just slips out sometimes? Can't wait to hear this LOL! üé§

LOL, totally been there! üòÖ Sometimes I catch myself saying "for your information" like I'm some sort of school teacher or something. Spillllllll üï∫

Cause you've got fine written all over your face!" üíÄ It was such a flop but now anytime we're being cringe or awkward, we just hit each other with the ‚Äúparking ticket‚Äù line. ü§£ What's something that always makes y‚Äôall crack up for no reason? It's dumb but it kills us every single time. üíÄ What's your most epic fail moment that turned into an inside joke? Spilllll the tea! üçµ
